FuncDef:
The set ds-lite inbound ipv4-tos command sets the ToS value in IPv4 packets transmitted from a public network to a private network in a DS-Lite instance.
The undo set ds-lite inbound ipv4-tos command deletes the ToS value in IPv4 packets transmitted from a public network to a private network in a DS-Lite instance.
By default, no ToS value is set for IPv4 packets transmitted from a public network to a private network in a DS-Lite instance.

ParaDef.Info:
Sets the ToS value of IPv4 packets that travel from a public network to a private network.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 255.

ExtraInfo: To set the ToS value in IPv4 packets transmitted from a public network to a private network in a DS-Lite instance, run the set ds-lite inbound ipv4-tos command.
